md:
giải nghĩa từ "occasion" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Occasion** (noun)

* Meaning: a particular time or situation when something happens or is done.
* Example: "The wedding was a special occasion for the whole family."
* Related words: event, celebration, ceremony, moment, time.

**Occasion** (verb)

* Meaning: to provide an opportunity for something to happen or be done.
* Example: "The new policy will occasion a lot of changes in the company."
* Related words: cause, lead, result, bring, trigger.

Note: The verb form of "occasion" is less common than the noun form.
html:
giải nghĩa từ "occasion" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

Occasion (noun)

  • Meaning: a particular time or situation when something happens or is done.
  • Example: "The wedding was a special occasion for the whole family."
  • Related words: event, celebration, ceremony, moment, time.

Occasion (verb)

  • Meaning: to provide an opportunity for something to happen or be done.
  • Example: "The new policy will occasion a lot of changes in the company."
  • Related words: cause, lead, result, bring, trigger.

Note: The verb form of "occasion" is less common than the noun form.
